Note: Prowl resembles his old Autobot self VERY remotely, so he probably wouldn't be identifyable at first glance, though someone that's known him for a long time might be able to.

::Prowl::

Prowl comes out behind Firedrill, looking around at the group of robots. Two of them looked strangely familiar, but he couldn't place his finger on the memory. He'd have to stick his hand into his head to do that anyways, so even trying would be a bother.

"Hello. What are you all doing here?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber had already left, but Cliffjumper turns to awnser, "Cause, I
> can't leave Firedrill, and we can't just hide from it, we need to say
> what we feel." 
> 
> He then turned to see Firedrill step out. "Okay kid, we're going to
> leave." but he becomes silenced as he sees another figuere follow him
> out.
